page.title: 32games at Banchory primary school
page.content:
50-50: We play 50-50 at break and lunch.One player in the game is it and they count to 50 . Everyone else hides. The player who is it will go snnd find everyone else and try to tag them. when you get to dell you shought 50-50 home.

Shark is when one person is it and they try and catch the others running back and forth.The last person who isn't cought is it.
Shauna and Anna
